snippet: The authority detailed Hurricane Sandy’s lingering effects on the subway system and said that in the near future, sand bags and plywood would continue to be a crucial line of defense.
abstract: Metropolitan Transportation Authority details Hurricane Sandy's lingering effects on subway system; says that sand bags and plywood will continue to be a crucial line of defense but it is working on more permanent ways to better protect the system.
lead_paragraph: The authority detailed Hurricane Sandy’s lingering effects on the subway system and said that in the near future, sand bags and plywood would continue to be a crucial line of defense.

headline.seo: For Now, M.T.A.’s Flooding Plan Still Relies on Sandbags and Plywood
headline.main: For M.T.A., Flood Plan Is Still a Work in Progress
headline.print_headline: For M.T.A., Flood Plan Is Still a Work In Progress
